name: Discord Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Discord Tool 节点。主要用于: Sends data to Discord

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Sends data to Discord | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Connection Type | 默认值: botToken
available_options: Bot Token (值: botToken) - Manage messages, channels, and members on a server
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2) - Same features as 'Bot Token' with easier Bot installation
Webhook (值: webhook) - Send messages to a specific channel

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: channel

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: sendLegacy
available_options: Send a Message (值: sendLegacy) - Send a message to a channel using the webhook

guildId.name: guildId
guildId.description: Select the server (guild) that your bot is connected to
guildId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Server | 作用: Select the server (guild) that your bot is connected to | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: Select the channel by name, URL, or ID
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel | 作用: Select the channel by name, URL, or ID | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: avatar_url (值: None) - Override the default avatar of the webhook
flags (值: None) - Message flags. More info.”.
tts (值: None) - Whether to have a bot reading the message directly in the channel
username (值: None) - Override the default username of the webhook
wait (值: None) - Whether wait for the message to be created before returning its response

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | 作用: The ID of the message | (必填项)

emoji.name: emoji
emoji.description: The emoji you want to react with
emoji.natural_language_description: 参数名: Emoji | 作用: The emoji you want to react with | (必填项)

sendTo.name: sendTo
sendTo.description: Send message to a channel or DM to a user
sendTo.natural_language_description: 参数名: Send To | 作用: Send message to a channel or DM to a user | 默认值: channel

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Select the user you want to assign a role to
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User | 作用: Select the user you want to assign a role to | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''}

content.name: content
content.description: The content of the message (up to 2000 characters)
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: The content of the message (up to 2000 characters)

embeds.name: embeds
embeds.natural_language_description: 参数名: Embeds | 默认值: []

files.name: files
files.natural_language_description: 参数名: Files | 默认值: []

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Type | 默认值: approval
available_options: Approval (值: approval) - User can approve/disapprove from within the message
Free Text (值: freeText) - User can submit a response via a form
Custom Form (值: customForm) - User can submit a response via a custom form

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Approval Options | 默认值: {}

name.name: name
name.description: The new name of the channel. Fill this field only if you want to change the channel's name.
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The new name of the channel. Fill this field only if you want to change the channel's name.

type.name: type
type.description: The type of channel to create
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: The type of channel to create | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

after.name: after
after.description: The ID of the user after which to return the members
after.natural_language_description: 参数名: After | 作用: The ID of the user after which to return the members

role.name: role
role.description: Select the roles you want to add to the user
role.natural_language_description: 参数名: Role | 作用: Select the roles you want to add to the user | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
